Info.Description: Allows to match and replace a color in an image.

Properties.Name: Target Color
Properties.Summary: Specifies the color in the image to replace.

Properties.Name: Tolerance
Properties.Summary:
Adjusts how much variation from the target color will be included in the selection.
A lower value will only select colors very similar to the target color, while a higher value will include a broader range of colors.

Properties.Name: Spread
Properties.Summary: Softens the edges of the color selection, resulting in a more natural transition between the replaced color and the surrounding colors.

Properties.Name: Hue
Properties.Summary: Modifies the hue of the replacement color.

Properties.Name: Saturation
Properties.Summary: Adjusts the intensity of the replacement color.

Properties.Name: Brightness
Properties.Summary: Changes the brightness of the replacement color.
